mapper.insert: insert into kiki(KikiSysId, kikiBunrui, kikiBunruiSeq, kikiNo, kikiMei, syukan, makerRyaku, maker, katasikiNo, serialNo, orderNo, bikou, imageId, trkDate, updDate) values( #{kikiSysId}, #{kikiBunrui}, #{kikiBunruiSeq}, #{kikiNo}, #{kikiMei}, #{syukan}, #{makerRyaku}, #{maker}, #{katasikiNo}, #{serialNo}, #{orderNo}, #{bikou}, #{imageId}, #{trkDate}, #{updDate} )
mapper.select: select kikiId from kiki ORDER BY kikiId DESC limit 1
